fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If the two players can win together, they immediately swap roles
-If they do not win together, but have similar goals (Kill all who oppose, hang all evils, ect) they lose any form of defense they had for the next 3 nights. If neither have defense, deal a basic attack to both
-If the two players oppose each other, deal a powerful attack to both
-Your visits are astral
